triples.name: Time series
triples.relevance: The paper addresses multivariate time-series data analysis and prediction tasks.

triples.name: Graph neural network
triples.relevance: The paper builds upon existing Graph Neural Network methods as the foundational approach.

triples.name: Forecasting
triples.relevance: Time series forecasting is a key application of the proposed method.

triples.name: Wireless sensor network
triples.relevance: Sensor networks generate the multivariate time-series data from multiple sensors that the method operates on.

triples.name: Convolution
triples.relevance: The FC graph convolution component uses convolutional operations to process spatial-temporal dependencies.

triples.name: Fully-Connected Spatial-Temporal Graph Neural Network
triples.relevance: This is the novel method proposed by the paper that captures correlations between different sensors at different timestamps.
